#summary Specifications about PCM (Pack CoMpress)
#labels Formato

These files are in the game "Professor Layton and the Curious Village" EUR version. It contains one or more files in it.

It can have LZ77 compression (first byte = 0x10)

= Details =

|| Offset || Size || Description ||
|| 0x00   || 4        || Header size, should be 0x10 ||
|| 0x04   || 4        || File size ||
|| 0x08   || 4        || File's number||
|| 0x0C   || 4        || Magic ID (LPCK = List PaCK) ||

Here start each file

|| 0x00   || 4        || Indicator of the beginning, should be 0x20 ||
|| 0x04   || 4        || File size ||
